text: Álvaro Barreirinhas Cunhal (; 10 November 1913 – 13 June 2005) was a Portuguese politician. He was secretary-general of the Portuguese Communist Party (PCP) from 1961 to 1992. He strongly supported the Soviet Union. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Communist politicians Category:Recipients of the Order of Lenin Category:Atheists Category:Portuguese writers Category:People from Coimbra
title: Álvaro Cunhal
